name: ZW - Ultimate Shield
text: When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 of your banished Xyz Monsters; Special Summon that target in face-up Defense Position. You can target 1 "Utopia" monster you control; equip this monster on the field to that target. It gains 2000 DEF. You can only control 1 face-up "ZW - Ultimate Shield".
